TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi AssemblyInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用来获取应用程序信息（如版本号、说明、加载的程序集等）的属性。

span.span: Provides properties for getting the information about the application, such as the version number, description, loaded assemblies, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info`对象公开的某些属性返回应用程序的程序集信息。Some of the properties exposed by the `My.Application.Info` object return the application's assembly information. 若要设置应用程序的程序集中的信息，您必须使用 "**程序集信息**" 对话框，该对话框可从 "**项目设计器**" 的 "**应用程序**" 窗格中访问。To set the information in the application's assembly, you must use the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**. 对象提供类似于类的功能，但其作用域为快速访问最常见的属性。 `My.Application.Info`The `My.Application.Info` object provides functionality similar to the class but is scoped to give quick access to the most common properties. 其他属性（如`LoadedAssemblies`）提供对应用程序的当前状态的访问。Other properties, such as `LoadedAssemblies`, provide access to the current state of the application. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.Version`属性来显示应用程序的版本。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#30)]

public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取应用程序的程序集文件的名称（不含扩展名）。

span.span: Gets the name, without the extension, of the assembly file for the application.
A containing the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`属性获取包含清单的文件的名称。The `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property gets the name of the file containing the manifest. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`属性来显示应用程序的名称。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property to display the name of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.CompanyName`属性获取与应用程序关联的公司名称。The `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property gets the company name associated with the application. 可以通过在 "**程序集信息**" 对话框中更改 "**公司**的值" 来更改公司名称，该对话框可从 "**项目设计器**" 的 "**应用程序**" 窗格中访问。You can change the company name by changing the value for **Company** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.CompanyName`属性显示与应用程序关联的公司名称。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property to display the company name associated with the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#21)]

Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StackTrace As String
public: property System::String ^ StackTrace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前的堆栈跟踪信息。

span.span: Gets the current stack-trace information.

value.span: 一个 值，包含当前的堆栈跟踪信息。

span.span: A containing the current stack-trace information.
The return value can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.StackTrace`属性以逆序顺序列出方法调用，也就是说，它首先描述最近的方法调用，并在单独的行上列出堆栈上的每个方法调用。The `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property lists method calls in reverse chronological order - that is, it describes the most recent method call first, and it lists each method call on the stack on a separate line. 但是， `My.Application.Info.StackTrace`由于优化期间发生的代码转换，属性可能不会按预期方式报告任意数量的方法调用。However, the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property might not report as many method calls as expected, due to code transformations that occur during optimization. 通常，堆栈跟踪信息用于调试应用程序。Typically, the stack-trace information is used for debugging applications. 每个方法调用的堆栈跟踪信息的格式如下：The stack-trace information for each method call is formatted as follows: "位于*FullClassName*。*方法名称*（*MethodParams*） in *FileName*： line *LineNumber* ""at *FullClassName*.*MethodName*(*MethodParams*) in *FileName*:line *LineNumber* " 文本 "at" 前面有三个空格，如果调试符号不可用，则省略文本 "in" 和 "： line"。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the literals "in" and ":line" are omitted if debug symbols are not available. 占位符`FullClassName` 、 `MethodName` 、、 `LineNumber` 和替换为实际值，定义如下： `MethodParams` `FileName`The placeholders `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber` are replaced by actual values, defined as follows: |部件Part|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |*FullClassName**FullClassName*|类的完整名称，包括命名空间。The full name of the class, including the namespace.| |*名称**MethodName*|方法的名称。The name of the method.| |*MethodParams**MethodParams*|参数类型/名称对的列表。The list of parameter type/name pairs. 每个对由逗号（，）分隔。Each pair is separated by a comma (,). 如果*方法名称*采用零个参数，则忽略此信息。This information is omitted if *MethodName* takes zero parameters.| |FileName*FileName*|声明*方法名称方法的*源文件的名称。The name of the source file where the *MethodName* method is declared. 如果调试符号不可用，则忽略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.| |*LineNumber**LineNumber*|*FileName*中的行号，其中包含针对调用堆栈上的指令的 "*方法名称*" 中的源代码。The number of the line in *FileName* that contains the source code from *MethodName* for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果调试符号不可用，则忽略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.| 属性提供类似于属性的功能。 `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace`The `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`属性从代码执行点显示应用程序的堆栈跟踪。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property to display the stack trace of the application from the point at which the code executes. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#27)]

exception.span: 请求的堆栈跟踪信息超出范围。

span.span: The requested stack-trace information is out of range.

ClickOnce 部署的应用程序应使用 属性的属性。ClickOnce-deployed applications should use the property of the property. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.Version`属性来显示应用程序的版本。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkingSet As Long
public: property long WorkingSet { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取映射到进程上下文的物理内存量。

span.span: Gets the amount of physical memory mapped to the process context.

value.span: 一个 值，包含映射到进程上下文的物理内存的字节数。

span.span: A containing the number of bytes of physical memory mapped to the process context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与属性具有相同的行为。 `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet`The `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet` property has the same behavior as the property. > [!NOTE] > 对于 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition，此属性始终返回零。This property always returns zero for Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.WorkingSet`属性显示映射到应用程序的物理内存的字节数。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet` property to display the number of bytes of physical memory mapped to the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#31)]

exception.span: 存在部分信任的情况，用户缺少必要的权限。

span.span: A situation in which partial trust exists and the user lacks necessary permissions.

permission.span: 控制访问所有环境变量的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access all environment variables.
